circumstances: The pilot stalled the airplane while making a steep turn to avoid high voltage power lines. The airplane caught fire on impact and the air taxi pilot subsequently died of extensive thermal injuries. The pilot was flying in formation with another aircraft at low altitude. When the power lines were sighted the other aircraft successfully pulled up and avoided the wires. The accident pilot turned steeply and lost control of the aircraft before crashing.
probable_cause:
Occurrence #1: loss of control - in flight
Phase of operation: maneuvering
Findings
1. (c) procedures/directives - not followed - pilot in command
2. (f) improper use of procedure - pilot in command
3. (c) airspeed - not maintained - pilot in command
4. (c) clearance - not maintained - pilot in command
